sites.js:
// 只适用于简单的代码调整  与其它 测试

// 如何十分复制的话还是使用 油猴插件配置脚本  或者直接开发 chrome 插件吧
sites.name: 网站通用

sites.compiledCss: * {font-family: 江西拙楷, 字体圈欣意冠黑体!important;}
sites.name: 调整notion样式

sites.compiledCss: html {!important;}.article-catalog, .author-info-block, .article-hero, .article-title, .article-suspended-panel, .activity-icon, .meiqia-btn, .sidebar {display: none!important;}.main-header-box {opacity: 0!important;}.main-container {max-width: 90% !important;}.main-area {overflow: scroll!important; width: 100% !important; height: 600px !important;}.recommend-area {overflow: scroll!important; height: 400px !important;}
sites.name: juejin 屏蔽

sites.compiledCss: html {!important;}.sticky-top, .align-items-center .btn-group-vertical, .right-side, #footer, .text-secondary, .functional-area-bottom, .bg-white .text-center .border .border-dark .border-width-2 .p-5 .my-4 .rounded {display: none !important;}.article-content .article-content {border: 1px solid rgb(119, 123, 206)!important; padding: 10px!important; overflow: scroll!important; height: 600px !important;}#comment-area {overflow: scroll!important; height: 300px !important;}.recommend-list-wrap .list-group {overflow: scroll!important; height: 300px !important;}
sites.name: 思否 屏蔽
